author: trawick
msg: Get apr_snprintf() compiling again on platforms without isnan() or
isinf().  (Such platforms include Solaris and OS/390.)

author: dreid
msg: This change gets BeOS building again. We have sigsuspend but we certainly
don't have pthread_ so we need to use sigprocmask the same as OS/390.
Also, change where the libraries are added.  This may not be right, but
with this change it's possible to get APR building as a shared library.
